Your Personalized Recovery Plan

She’s in the peak phase, where shedding feels at its worst but baby hairs show her body is already fighting back. The main driver—ongoing chronic stress—can’t always be switched off instantly, so this plan teaches her to steady the system now through deeper rest and stress reset. With consistent sleep and stronger nutrition foundations, follicles can leave the shedding state and move toward stabilization. Each small, calm day helps her regain control and move closer to visible recovery. ✨

Start today—every steady night and nourished meal brings regrowth nearer.
